website_summaries.verdict: This cellular phone booster is a solid choice for basements, metal buildings, and bigger homes with distinct dead spots.
pros: Dual antennas easily cover large homes
Designed for multiple users on the same network
Compatible with all major cellular brands
cons: Finding the optimal location for the antennas may take a few attempts

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: We are out in the sticks in South Mississippi and have verizon. We had a 118 dBm on the inside of the house and 107 dBm on the roof prior to using the Signal Plus. After installing SolidRF we have 82 near the inside antenna and 95-105 dBm at the furthest rooms. Our house is about 2500 square foot, I put one inside antenna in livingroom, theother one in Basement, and the booster covers every room.It's only been 5 days, but so far it has worked better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Very responsive customer service
customer_reviews.text: I asked many questions before purchasing this booster, and always got a response quickly...almost always within one hour. I was very concerned because my tower is about 9 miles away. I had to stand by my window if I wanted any chance of getting reception. Now I am getting great reception everywhere in my home. (I learned that bars don't mean too much. I am using two Verizon network phones. One now gives me 4 bars, the other 2, but they both now work great anywhere in my two story home.
customer_reviews.author: D. Petron

customer_reviews.title: fantastic customer service-Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: In my 83 years of life I never had a better, more dedicated, and interested customer service. He stayed with me until I could get the best cellular service I could have in my environment. The product represents an excellent value, is creative with respect to coverage in different areas of the house by providing 2 inside antennas. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Not Maven

customer_reviews.title: Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: First off it does boost incoming signal but after 3 days of use not a steady stream not sure about 5g don't have very good 4g yet. My location is in a National Forest. Best signal is 2 bars by cell phone most days. I am using it inside a all metal building about 2000 sq open with one transmitter inside can not keep 4g, 3g yes. For the price I guess it's ok I bought a different type at BB and paid $300 more that does as good almost. Would I buy another. Probably not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really useful product
customer_reviews.text: I have used other cell phone signal boosters that did not work well before. I was very worried when I purchased this product. But after reading most of the reviews, I made up my mind to buy this signal booster. When I installed the external antenna on the metal roof of my house, this product ushered in the final test. It turns out that it is worth it to spend a few hours to complete the installation. The signal of my mobile phone changed to 4 bars one minute after the signal booster was turned on. Thanks Amazon! I finally found a really useful product! ! !
customer_reviews.author: leo plus

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It took my cellphone from dropping calls every few seconds to 4 full signal bars and great call quality after successfully completing the installation of the signal booster. You should be aware of the terrible experience of not having LET signals in remote rural areas all year round. I am very fortunate to have purchased this signal booster. Although it is not cheap, it is definitely worth the money I paid! PS: It is recommended that you should read the manual carefully or seek technical support before installation. It took me 2 hours to install this signal booster.
customer_reviews.author: JOJO

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I followed the installation recommendations from previous reviews and located my cell tower and installed it as high as possible to mitigate signal obstructions. My initial signal strength before installation was 2 bars outside and 1/2 bars inside. After installation, I got 4 bars next to the signal booster. I walked around the house and observed that my mobile phone was holding 3-4 bars. I've had the unit on constantly since I installed it and have had no problems. It works, so it's worth every penny to me.
customer_reviews.author: Zara baby

customer_reviews.title: Sill dropping calls
customer_reviews.text: It went up easy enough just had to run the cabling but the service inside where it’s repeating is still kind of intermittent sometimes, not 100% but working OK. I think it’s doing a good job but my service gets so week sometimes that even amplifying the little bit is not enough to make a connection.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Topping

customer_reviews.title: Works As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Installed this unit in a 2 story 24'x48' pole barn that I'm pretty much finishing the inside. No cell service inside a steel building.... Followed the instructions and even though the outside signal is mostly only a couple of bars, I get 2 to 4 bars consistently inside the barn. I placed an indoor antennae on each level facing the same direction and have full coverage throughout including pass-thru of walls and doors.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Crain

customer_reviews.title: Great system for my aircraft hangar!
customer_reviews.text: The system I purchased is made from quality materials. The installation was a breeze once I received clarification on a minor issue. Once my question was answered by customer service, I requested additional coax and it was provided to me promptly! Customer service was great. Knowledgeable of their product and super helpful explaining a technical issue to me, a non-technical person! I highly recommend this product and, if needed, I would buy from them again. RD
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: This booster is working great for me &  I recomend it.
customer_reviews.text: I had extremely unreliable cell service @ my home. My texts routinely failed to go through. I purchased this system after I returned a cheeper booster from a different manufacturer. I Installed both on a 30 foot mast. I put 1 antenna in my house and the other 60 feet from the booster in my shop & plugged it in. I was then able to have a 20 minute FaceTime call without any problems. Only complaint is the cables are too short.
customer_reviews.author: BuzzardBait

customer_reviews.title: Works Great.
customer_reviews.text: Had 2 bars outside building before install, 0 bars inside. Now have 4 to 5 bars inside. One key on install is do not run any cables mounted on or against any metal surface. Works Great!!
customer_reviews.author: MJM

customer_reviews.title: complete all installation before plugging in
customer_reviews.text: installed as expected,since already had an older unit. went from cut out and drop calls to 4 bars,very happy so far
customer_reviews.author: randy l.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Top quality beyond expect. Went from 1 bar to a solid 4 immediately after installation. Superb performance!!
customer_reviews.author: Yazmin

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: There are two indoor antennas, looks good.I haven't installed it yet, will update the review after using it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: it does increase the signal range
customer_reviews.text: it works great so far, this is the 2nd one we acquired
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Massive disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Had to update my review and drop this product down to 1 star. It just isn't consistent and does not deliver anywhere near the signal increase to justify the cost. At best there is a minor increase in signal when you are directly in front of one of the two panels. This is a load of work for very little results, and by the time you have done everything possible to really test this thing, they close the window for returns and you're stuck with a bunch of plastic and wires that did nothing to solve your problem. We are so disappointed with this incredible waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Moonlightbiker

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older smaller unit. It was easy to install. I had pre-wired my house for projects like this so cables were already in place. We have much better coverage than before. Our signal is weak so we weren't expecting miracles. We have coverage all over the house now on both floors. Now if it will hold up as well as our old system, I will be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam R

customer_reviews.title: Works great . 1 bar to full bars
customer_reviews.text: We can no longer stand the days when we can't make normal calls at home and without internet. Since we moved to this small town, our mobile phone can only receive one signal. I have to say that this product is really not cheap. But after comparing other products, I was determined to buy this. After receiving the courier, I completed the installation according to the instructions. At the moment the signal booster was turned on, the signal of my mobile phone changed from 1 bar to Full bars in an instant!!! Great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gery

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS! YOU DO NOT RECEIVE THE ITEM IN THE PHOTO. I ordered it, returned it becuase it was the wrong thing, and got the wrong thing AGAIN. AVOID THIS ITEM!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought a cheaper system based on reviews. Returned it. This system has two remote antennas. I have metal roof and could not make a call inside. Now I can make calls in the house. Your results may differ.
customer_reviews.author: MDH

customer_reviews.title: Working is good!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and hook up,because my house has installed other signal booster before,the installation was quick this time.just follow the installation instructions.working is good.
customer_reviews.author: Cici Lee

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: In the past, there was only 1-2 bars on my phone. After I installed this signal booster, my phone got 4-5 bars of signal! ! ! What is even more surprising is that this situation is very stable, and now I can make smooth calls at home.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo9527

customer_reviews.title: 🧐🧐🧐🧐
customer_reviews.text: OK, this signal booster is indeed as powerful as its advertisement description, and has a very large coverage. For me this is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Strong signal
customer_reviews.text: Well product! My phone can be better signal compare to before, even when I was in the second floor, still very strong signal. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: davina724

customer_reviews.title: Easy solution to boost cell signal
customer_reviews.text: Pretty straight forward to install and use. Worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: ski

customer_reviews.title: Time investment
customer_reviews.text: My husband (who is a great handy man), spent 2 days working to install this. When it didn't work, he spent time trying to diagnose how to make this work. There needs to be a way to see if it works prior to running cable as well as anything needed to go on the exterior of the house. We found one for half the price through Google and it took 20 minutes to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!  Good Value!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for a medium cell signal booster!! We were getting -110 to -120 db in the house (0-2 bars). Now we get -84 to -106!! (2-5 bars). What an improvement! We dropped our lousy internet service with Frontier ($149 for 2-4 mb of service) and are using Verizon mobile hotspot for everything.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Strahlman

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement in cell service
customer_reviews.text: With T-Mobile I've been able to get full bars 4g or 5g where I used to get 2 or 3 bars max. My son didn't get any service with Verizon before and now he gets 2-3 bars. It took my husband about 1/2 a day to get everything installed and running but it's made a huge improvement in our cell reception.
customer_reviews.author: bbnj

customer_reviews.title: Went from zero bars to 4+ bars upon hookup.
customer_reviews.text: Easy hookup. Good quality system. We live in the mountains and had no bars of service after our last cell phone booster died. Hooked this up and immediately went from zero bars to 4+ bars. Clearer quality calls than I had with the prior booster set up. Life is good.
customer_reviews.author: mmlmm

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as good as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The booster is not very strong. The antennas only work in the room they are in. The system is recommended for over 5,000 square feet. That would depends completely on the type of construction.
customer_reviews.author: george

product_meta.title: SolidRF Cell Phone Booster for Home Dual Interior Antennas Office Multiroom Up to 8, 000 sq ft | Verizon, AT&T, T-Mobile, Sprint & More Signal Plus Cell Signal Booster Kit
product_meta.description:
Style:SignalPlus1. Solidrf has been committed to creating convenient and easy-to-use high-end cell phone signal amplifier with new technologies and new processes.
2. We introducing the dual-interior panel antennas cell signal booster. Featuring a high gain amplifier, powerful outside directional antenna, Tru5 Band enhanced internal circuitry, and more. The Signal Plus kit is the most cost efficency dual-interior antennas cell signal booster available on the market today. 
3. SolidRF has always insisted on using a fully enclosed aluminum enclosure for the amplifier. There are two benefits to do so. The first is that the amplifier generates a lot of heat when it works. Good heat dissipation can ensure the stable operation of the equipment and the life of the internal components. All solidrf booster have a 3 year . The second benefit is that Wireless signal amplifiers all have electromagnetic radiation, and a fully enclosed metal casing can ensure that all electromagnetic radiation is confined inside the device and will not cause radiation and interference to the surrounding environment. 4.Compared with the traditional one indoor antenna scheme, the performance improvement of the two interior panel antennas will double coverage ability inside the building. Provides two zones of coverage in any size home or office. This is the best solution especially if the target coverage area is a two-story building, or if the internal building can't be covered by one antenna because of building materials that block cell signal (plaster, concrete, metal, UV-coated glass, etc. )
5. Tru5 band technology is unique to solidrf. Because the downlink of the two bands Band12 and Band13 is physically connected. The products of other companies use an amplification link for processing. solidrf creatively uses two amplification links to amplify the signals in these two frequency bands. At present, only our products on the market will not cause the strong signal to suppress the weak signal amplification because the strength of the two frequency bands is different. Vehicle often encounters this situation because it needs to move constantly. With our products, you will not encounter the situation where you cannot receive signals from your own base station in the distance because your position is close to a certain( not yours) operator's base station.
6. There is no end to innovation. SolidRF has been adhering to the ingenuity of an engineer, and constantly trying and making continuous efforts to make better products is our only goal and our interest.
feature_bullets: Dual-Interior Antenna Serves As A Complete, In Building Connectivity Solution. Provides Two Zones Of Coverage In Any Size Home Or Office.Allowing everyone to enjoy fewer dropped calls, better voice quality, and faster data speeds within its coverage area.

High Gain (70dB), Pick Up Weak Signal Over Long Distance, Maximum Communication Distance Range Up To 3~5 Miles. Enhances The Signal Up To 1000X, With A Coverage Area Of 8, 000 sq ft. And Up. (Note: coverage area range depends on the outdoor signal level: 1-2 bars (-100dBm) ~1, 000 sq ft. , 3-4 bars (-90dBm) ~4, 000 sq ft. , 5 bars (-80dBm) ~8, 000 sq ft. ). Suitable For Remote Area

Sturdy Aluminum Case With Integrated Heat Sink And LED Status Lights. Excellent Heat Dissipation，which can make the booster work steadily all the time. Work For Band 12/13/5/2/4/25 Compatible With All US & Canada Carriers, Including: AT&T, Verizon, T-mobile, Sprint, U. S. Cellular, Bell, Telus, Rogers, Fido, Sasktel, MTS, Etc Across North America

Unique Tru5 Technology: Separate Into 10 Circuits Channel, Separated Band 12 And Band 13 Maximum Supportable Data Download/Upload Speed Up To 40(mbps) For AT&T/T-mobile And Verizon. Boosts Voice, Text And Data Signals. Multi-user Simultaneous Connectivity: Smart Phones, Tablets, Modems, Wi-fi Hot-spots Can All Directly Connect At The Same Time
Fcc Approved. Automatically Adjusts System Gain And Power Level To Get The Optimum Result. No Manual Intervention Needed. Easy Setup. Complete Installation Can Be Done In 3 Hours By 2 Person

With A Better Incoming Signal, Cell Phones Require Less Output Power To Send And Receive A Signal. This Can Significantly Reduce The Required Transmission Power Of Mobile Phones And Therefore Reduce The Level Of Electromagnetic Radiation Exposure To The Human Body. At The Same Time, Having A Better Signal Reduces Power Usage, Which Saves Your Battery And Can And Improve Battery Life Of Phones On Standby Mode By Up To An Additional 2 Hours

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars83 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
